document_data.name: ''Fox Paws''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''fox paws''''' were [[enchanted]] [[boot]]s designed to provide both defense and agility. They were sized for a [[halfling]].
document_data.Description: The ''fox paws'' were metal, and equivalent to the boots in a set of [[plate mail]].
document_data.Powers: A wearer of the ''fox paws'' was said to be as swift and sure-footed as a [[fox]], allowing them to move about the battlefield at surprising speed and making them harder to hit.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Tommus Tallstep]], a halfling [[fighter]] and [[adventurer]] active in [[Waterdeep]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]], possessed not only the boots but a matching [[helmet]] and [[armor]].
